languages.text: "Ух, зараза! Вроде и жарко тут как в котельной, и несет смазкой и сваркой, да только чую я и другие запахи... гниет как будто что-то..."

traits.locale_text: "Ух, зараза! Вроде и жарко тут как в котельной, и несет смазкой и сваркой, да только чую я и другие запахи... гниет как будто что-то..."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Ugh, rank! It's as hot as a furnace in here, and it stinks of grease and burnt metal... But there are other smells too... like something rotten..."
languages.original_text: "Ух, зараза! Вроде и жарко тут как в котельной, и несет смазкой и сваркой, да только чую я и другие запахи... гниет как будто что-то..."

traits.locale_text: "Ugh, rank! It's as hot as a furnace in here, and it stinks of grease and burnt metal... But there are other smells too... like something rotten..."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Ugh, rank! It's as hot as a furnace in here, and it stinks of grease and burnt metal... But there are other smells too... like something rotten..."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Ugh, rank! It's as hot as a furnace in here, and it stinks of grease and burnt metal... But there are other smells too... like something rotten..."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Ugh, rank! It's as hot as a furnace in here, and it stinks of grease and burnt metal... But there are other smells too... like something rotten..."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “呃啊，臭死了！这里就像火炉一样热，还散发着油脂和烧焦金属的臭味……但我还闻到了别的味道……像是什么东西烂了……”
languages.original_text: "Ugh, rank! It's as hot as a furnace in here, and it stinks of grease and burnt metal... But there are other smells too... like something rotten..."

traits.locale_text: “呃啊，臭死了！这里就像火炉一样热，还散发着油脂和烧焦金属的臭味……但我还闻到了别的味道……像是什么东西烂了……”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «¡Puaj, repugnante! Esto es un horno y apesta a grasa y metal quemado... pero también hay otros olores... como a algo podrido...».
languages.original_text: "Ugh, rank! It's as hot as a furnace in here, and it stinks of grease and burnt metal... But there are other smells too... like something rotten..."

traits.locale_text: «¡Puaj, repugnante! Esto es un horno y apesta a grasa y metal quemado... pero también hay otros olores... como a algo podrido...».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「ううっ、酷い匂い！ここは炉のように熱く、油と金属の焼けた匂いがするわ。でも、ほかにもなんだか…腐ったような匂いもするわね…」
languages.original_text: "Ugh, rank! It's as hot as a furnace in here, and it stinks of grease and burnt metal... But there are other smells too... like something rotten..."

traits.locale_text: 「ううっ、酷い匂い！ここは炉のように熱く、油と金属の焼けた匂いがするわ。でも、ほかにもなんだか…腐ったような匂いもするわね…」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Ugh, verdammt. Hier drin ist es wärmer als in einer Schmiede und es stinkt nach Schmiere und verbranntem Metall ... Aber es gibt noch andere Gerüche ... als würde etwas verrotten ..."
languages.original_text: "Ugh, rank! It's as hot as a furnace in here, and it stinks of grease and burnt metal... But there are other smells too... like something rotten..."

traits.locale_text: "Ugh, verdammt. Hier drin ist es wärmer als in einer Schmiede und es stinkt nach Schmiere und verbranntem Metall ... Aber es gibt noch andere Gerüche ... als würde etwas verrotten ..."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Argh, quelle torture ! Il fait aussi chaud ici que dans un fourneau, et ça empeste la graisse et le métal brûlé... Sans compter... qu'il y a aussi comme une odeur de pourriture... »
languages.original_text: "Ugh, rank! It's as hot as a furnace in here, and it stinks of grease and burnt metal... But there are other smells too... like something rotten..."

traits.locale_text: « Argh, quelle torture ! Il fait aussi chaud ici que dans un fourneau, et ça empeste la graisse et le métal brûlé... Sans compter... qu'il y a aussi comme une odeur de pourriture... »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Ah, iğrenç! Ortam fırın gibi sıcak, yağ ve yanmış metal kokuyor ama başka kokular da var... Bir şeyler çürümüş gibi."
languages.original_text: "Ugh, rank! It's as hot as a furnace in here, and it stinks of grease and burnt metal... But there are other smells too... like something rotten..."

traits.locale_text: "Ah, iğrenç! Ortam fırın gibi sıcak, yağ ve yanmış metal kokuyor ama başka kokular da var... Bir şeyler çürümüş gibi."
